Your trial period for {{product_name}} is about expired. Is there anything we can do to help?

[Product Name] ( https://example.com )

************
Hi {{name}},
************

Thanks for trying [Product Name]. Your trial period ends in 3 days, and we wanted to give you a heads up.

You've created a fair amount of data on your account, so we've included information on several options for you to consider going forward.

Upgrade your account ( %5C{{ action_url }} )

If you're not ready to upgrade to a paying account, you have a few other options available to you…

* Restart your trial ( {{ trial_extension_url }} ) - If you didn't get a chance to try the product out fully or just need a little more time to evaluate it, just let us know. Just reply to this email, and we'll set you up with a fresh trial period.
* Share some feedback ( {{ feedback_url }} ) - If [Product Name] isn't right for you, let us know what you were looking for and we might be able to suggest some alternative products that might be a better fit.
* Export your data ( {{ export_url }} ) - If [Product Name] wasn't a good fit, you can export your data for use elsewhere.
* Close your account ( {{ close_account_url }} ) - You can also close your account and delete your data. Or, do nothing and we'll clean up for you in a couple of months. Don't worry, we'll send you another heads up before that happens, though.

Regardless of your choice, we just want to say thanks for trying out [Product Name]. We know it's time consuming, so we appreciate you giving us a chance.

Thanks,
[Sender Name] and the [Product Name] Team

P.S. If you have any questions or need any help, please don't hesitate to reach out. You can reply to this email or join us on live chat during business hours.
